verses.verse: Now Elisha<WH477> had spoken<WH1696> unto the woman<WH802>, whose son<WH1121> he had restored to life<WH2421>, saying<WH559>, Arise<WH6965>, and go<WH3212> thou and thy household<WH1004>, and sojourn<WH1481> wheresoever<WH834> thou canst sojourn<WH1481>: for Jehovah<WH3068> hath called<WH7121> for a famine<WH7458>; and it shall also come<WH935> upon the land<WH776> seven<WH7651> years<WH8141>.
